name: parenthetically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is in addition to the main part of what you are saying or writing: Quotations from this text will be cited parenthetically. I might add, parenthetically, that she was a great supporter of the party. See
parenthetical
More examplesFewer examples"Not that I'm saying it's all over now," he said parenthetically.It seems with young people, that the word "like" must be used parenthetically at least once in every sentence.It should be noted parenthetically that the board asked for his support.
